Login.addLinksToApp: Add links to Check with one click. Links will be added to your selected list. If the link already exists, you are able to annotate it.
Login.start: To get started, sign in and then reload the page.
saveOrUpdate.error: Sorry, could not look for this URL in Check.
saveOrUpdate.loading: Looking for this URL in Check…
saveOrUpdate.errorNoUrlOrText: You need to enter at least a URL or a piece of text.
update.alreadyAdded: This link has already been added.
save.noTeam: You must be a member of at least one team in order to use the browser extension.
